content: the eyelet row next to the garter edge and anchor in a crescent shape then pin out each gingko leaf see photo enjoy please note without vigorous blocking this garter tab cast- on tends to form a small hump at the beginning of the shawl and even with blocking it may not lay completely flat if this is bothersome you might try a quick steam spot-block of the problem area as needed or utilize another method of starting the shawl as long as the desired number of stitches is reached before beginning the lace section you should be fine
